sentences.sentence: The doctor may use the otoscope to blow a little puff of air in your ear. Why?
sentences.translation: 医生可能会使用耳镜向你耳朵中吹一小股气，为什么呢？

sentences.sentence: If you can't even get an otoscope cone in, medication is not getting in either!
sentences.translation: 如果你不能让椎体耳镜进入耳道，药物也不能进入！

sentences.sentence: The doctor will look into your ear with a special flashlight called an otoscope (say: oh -te-skope).
sentences.translation: 医生会使用耳镜，像一个特殊的手电筒一样，来检查你的耳朵。
